excerpt: Curious to know the Netflix schedule from May 26 to June 1, 2025? Here is a list of movies and TV shows being added to the platform.

text: The Netflix schedule for May 26 to June 1, 2025, includes Cold Case: The Tylenol Murders (Limited Series), CoComelon, Dept. Q (Season 1), A Widow’s Game, and others. On May 26, Cold Case: The Tylenol Murders drops on Netflix. The documentary series explores the shocking murder cases involving cyanide-laced Tylenol in the country. Every episode explores interesting theories contributing to the investigation. Additionally, CoComelon will be available on the streaming platform on the same day. The animated series focuses on JJ and his siblings’ fun-loving musical adventures. They try to learn about numbers, the alphabet, good manners, and other preschool lessons through music. Further, the British crime thriller series Dept. Q (Season 1) premieres on Netflix. The show is based on Jussi Adler-Olsen’s book franchise. The series follows a cop named Carl Morck, who tries to solve complicated cases along with a team of misfit officers. Also coming out on Netflix is A Widow’s Game (2025). The Spanish thriller explores the murder case of an engineer. He was brutally stabbed to death, and his widowed nurse, Maje, ends up becoming the prime suspect of the crime. New Netflix releases for May 26-June 1, 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Netflix from May 26 to June 1, 2025. Monday, May 26 CoComelon Mike Birbiglia: The Good Life (2025) Cold Case: The Tylenol Murders (Limited Series) Wednesday, May 28 F1: The Academy (Season 1) Thursday, May 29 Dept. Q (Season 1) Mad Unicorn Losmen Bu Broto: The Series (Season 1) Friday, May 30 A Widow’s Game (2025) Lost in Starlight (2025) The Heart Knows (2025) The June 2026 Netflix releases have not been revealed. For more Netflix content, check out an update on the second season of Adolescence. Also, here is the Sirens’ ending explained.
html:
The Netflix schedule for May 26 to June 1, 2025, includes Cold Case: The Tylenol Murders (Limited Series), CoComelon, Dept. Q (Season 1), A Widow’s Game, and others.

On May 26, Cold Case: The Tylenol Murders drops on Netflix. The documentary series explores the shocking murder cases involving cyanide-laced Tylenol in the country. Every episode explores interesting theories contributing to the investigation.

Additionally, CoComelon will be available on the streaming platform on the same day. The animated series focuses on JJ and his siblings’ fun-loving musical adventures. They try to learn about numbers, the alphabet, good manners, and other preschool lessons through music.

Further, the British crime thriller series Dept. Q (Season 1) premieres on Netflix. The show is based on Jussi Adler-Olsen’s book franchise. The series follows a cop named Carl Morck, who tries to solve complicated cases along with a team of misfit officers.

Also coming out on Netflix is A Widow’s Game (2025). The Spanish thriller explores the murder case of an engineer. He was brutally stabbed to death, and his widowed nurse, Maje, ends up becoming the prime suspect of the crime.

New Netflix releases for May 26-June 1, 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Netflix from May 26 to June 1, 2025.

Monday, May 26

  • CoComelon
  • Mike Birbiglia: The Good Life (2025)
  • Cold Case: The Tylenol Murders (Limited Series)

Wednesday, May 28

  • F1: The Academy (Season 1)

Thursday, May 29

  • Dept. Q (Season 1)
  • Mad Unicorn
  • Losmen Bu Broto: The Series (Season 1)

Friday, May 30

  • A Widow’s Game (2025)
  • Lost in Starlight (2025)
  • The Heart Knows (2025)

The June 2026 Netflix releases have not been revealed.

For more Netflix content, check out an update on the second season of Adolescence. Also, here is the Sirens’ ending explained.
